title: A Trusting Heart
description: Eight years after filling the role of runaway bride, Megan Garrett inexplicably finds herself at her high school reunion. After being tormented by her ex-fiance, Megan decides to finally leave all memories of high school behind. But there's one person, the handsome Trevor Riley, who doesn't want to let her get away again. Be charmed alongside Megan as she learns to trust her heart.
author: Shannon Guymon
